# Apollo SDK

Generated TypeScript and Python SDKs for AUI API.

## Installation

### TypeScript/JavaScript
```bash
npm install @aui.io/apollo-sdk
```

### Python
```bash
pip install aui-apollo-sdk
```

## Usage

See the [API Documentation](https://aui.docs.buildwithfern.com) for detailed usage instructions.

---

**Note**: This repository contains auto-generated SDK code managed by Fern. Do not edit directly.
